lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: "To accomplish great things, we must dream as well as act." Anatole France

lender.name: Dina
lender.loan_because: I've visited some less fortunate places in my travels. While it's nice to hand out money to people a dollar at a time, I feel this is a more meaningful and lasting way of addressing poverty and empowering people's drive to support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I care for very sick adults in a large university hospital.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I heard about this site from a friend and thought it was a brilliant way to extend help to people I would otherwise never come into contact with.

lender.name: cAlderink
lender.occupation: Still a student in high school
lender.loan_because: i truly do care [:

lender.name: Lorraine J.
lender.loan_because: It doesn't take much to make a big difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with animals of all kinds and their guardians to help bring harmony and balance to their relationships. Some of the skills I use are; Animal Communication, CranioSacral Therapy, Energy Work, Spiritual Counseling and Behavior Modification Techniques.

lender.name: Kristofer
lender.loan_because: My mother is a woman from the Philippines, who has worked hard and managed to build a successfull business in America.
lender.occupational_info: I advise students on their educational path to take to get the career they want.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that I can be a tool for change in someone's life.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I believe I receive far more than I give

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I want to help someone I can see and affect directly.

lender.name: Chris Erik & Stine
lender.loan_because: A small amount for me can make a big amount for the entrepenour...
lender.occupational_info: Sitting behind a computer all day long

lender.name: wayne
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good

lender.name: Mihai
lender.loan_because: Really like the concept, hope its doing some good.

lender.name: Carrie and Sarah
lender.loan_because: We want to support other entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: We design and manufacture a line of children's clothes, including organic knit clothing.

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: I love seeing people empowered by their own ideas and money talks!

lender.name: Christopher
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university helping students through the admission process. (If the student wants to attend college, they start by talking to me!)

lender.name: Lou
lender.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the design of microprocessors.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and my family and I want others to share in those blessings.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good!

lender.name: SFH
lender.loan_because:
Microfinance enables true entrepreneurs, empowers women, and raises standards of competitiveness.
Beyond that, providing access to capital is simply the right thing to do.

lender.name: Justus
lender.loan_because: To give them a future...like I have.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity to build their futures more brightly!
lender.occupational_info: Consulting and Sales to Global organizations.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to "Pay It Forward"
lender.occupational_info: I work at a bank in the IT department.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to help women build successful businesses to become independent and self-sufficient. With this, they will feel more beautiful inside and out! AND their children will feel this too. The benefits are boundless!!!
lender.occupational_info: What I want you to know about me is that I'm a mom, wife, daughter, sister, and friend. The 'job' that makes me smile the most is my kids. Two boys - 17 yr old and 12 yr old. They are my heart. My husband is my best friend. Married for 18 years. I am 46 years 'young'. I can't wait to track the success of my FIRST Kiva loan with these fabulous women!!

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: it's a way to show that you care about PEOPLE and believe in their ability to become self-sufficient no matter who or where they are.

lender.name: Haszak.org
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together. Just a little bit can make a big difference!
lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer all day writing software. I work hard in the hope that my efforts are helping other people.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: My son told me about Kiva, and now I'm "hooked".

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: My life has been blessed and I want to give back as much as I can. It is important for me to know that I have made a difference in another human being's life.

lender.name: ben, juliette,lucy,josh
lender.loan_because: it helps us feel connected to the world

lender.name: Ladybug
lender.loan_because: I have had times when the world has smiled upon me
lender.occupational_info: I run around and have fun spreading love

lender.name: Unite Ventures
lender.loan_because: The smallest good deed is worth a thousand grand intentions.
lender.occupational_info: As a social entrepreneur i collaborate with like minded individuals in order to improve systems, visualize and disseminate new approaches and advance sustainable solutions that create social value.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." (Margaret Mead)

lender.name: Arlet
lender.loan_because: it is one way that I can make a small difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with young children who have learning disabilities; especially in the areas of reading, spelling and writing.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I am interested to see the development and growth my loans can make. And to give the opportunity to make an impact to some one else as well.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently working in Sales at a department store in the Seattle area.

lender.name: Snow Mountain Alpacas
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be afforded the opportunities we have
lender.occupational_info: Raise alpacas and process alpaca fiber into yarns and finished products

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: I visited Tanzania and did some development work there and I have seen how a little can do a lot
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital, taking care of people

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I believe that loans of this nature can utterly transform the lives of hard-working, resourceful people around the world, and help them provide a better future for their children.
lender.occupational_info: I help people sell things over the Internet.

lender.name: thibaud
lender.loan_because: I want share the luck I enjoy and help others less lucky

lender.name: Alfia
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach computers to elementary school children.

lender.name: Barnabas

lender.occupational_info: Glorifying the Lord Almighty.

lender.name: Jason & Janaye
lender.loan_because: I want to help others that are trying to help themselves. Also, I want to be an entrepreneur one day and I would want someone to support my business.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to get a degree!

lender.name: Tom and Sharon
lender.loan_because: We are aware of the those who are stricken with poverty in our world. It is important to do what we can to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. My special interest is helping children who exhibit special needs. My husband is in the lumber business.

lender.name: Giovanni
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jalen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Katerina

lender.occupational_info: I put on events with anywhere from 400-12500 atendees across the world.

lender.name: jawid
lender.loan_because: God has been kind on me and given me the resources to help others.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: Been having some good luck so I'm paying it forward
lender.occupational_info: I watch small children and serve people food.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: just a little can do a lot.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I study microfinance so much I figure I should do some.
lender.occupational_info: I study sustainable natural resource use.

lender.name: R. Nichol
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children in low-income neighborhoods to become successful individuals.

lender.name: Blaize
lender.loan_because: I want to help people. I am lucky to live in a wonderful country. My Aunt Holly sent me my first Gift Certificate.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school now. Im in Grade 4. I like to skateboard and play basketball.

lender.name: Boracaysun
lender.loan_because: What goes around, comes around.

lender.name: The Soliven Family
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of educators and students.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I believe that empowering people in their lives lifts everyone else up.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children English who come to the U.S. from other countries.

lender.name: Mitch & Kari
lender.occupation: VP of marketing agency / boutique owner
lender.loan_because: You are most likely to stumble upon happiness and good fortune while attempting to make others happy and successful.
lender.occupational_info:
Simply put...
Mitch works with companies implementing online marketing solutions to increase leads and sales.
Kari owns a womens clothing boutique located in Ontario, Canada. What she loves most about having the store is the interaction she has with so many different women on a daily basis. It's these women who inspire her everyday to be unique and to help others.

lender.name: Tucson Bunco Babes
lender.loan_because: We wanted to let our Bunco prize money to be put to a better use.
lender.occupational_info: Most of our group are retired elementary school teachers and we still want to make a difference. This is a great way!

lender.name: Shailesh
lender.loan_because: I must
lender.occupational_info: online obsessed

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Life's been good to me, so I'm just trying to spread it around.
lender.occupational_info: I give people beer.....they give me money.

lender.name: Gurtej
lender.loan_because: I care greatly about the issue of global poverty and I believe that this can help me make a small contribution towards solving this enormous problem.
lender.occupational_info: I study what makes certain countries rich and other countries poor - Political Economy of Economic Development.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: a friend gave a gift certificate...and it just keeps giving!

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: I would like to share God's blessings.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: GOD
lender.occupational_info: Corporate Private

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: To help others in need
lender.occupational_info: Promote my company

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to give back! It's not much, because I am a single mother, working and going to school, but I believe that every little bit I can share is well worth the sacrifice! If it helps someone attain their goals and dreams, it is money well spent!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant serving food. I raise two beautiful children and attend college with hopes of attending law school one day.

lender.name: Isaac
lender.loan_because: Micro loans seem to be a very effective way for me, as an individual, to make an impact in the lives of people in other parts of the world.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: microcredit loans are people helping people make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a department of the government that mixes geographic data and information technology.

lender.name: Clark
lender.loan_because: We are all one nation under God. We are all indivisible.

lender.name: Givearn
lender.loan_because: We at Givearn.com figured out a way to make others better off without making anyone worse off. Now that's what we call efficient!

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed to be living in what is arguably the greatest country in the world and would like to be able to share in the driving spirit of those who aren't in as beneficial a place as I am yet continue striving to do their best under conditions which are oftentimes difficult to even imagine.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Repair

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org lets us give a hand up and not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: Internet entrepreneur

lender.name: Mr. Hayes
lender.loan_because: We want to make difference by making other peoples' dreams come true. We know that helping others will help ourselves feel better about our contribution. We also want to make difference in the communities of third world countries.
lender.occupational_info: Our two classes have been involved in raising money through bottle drives and other means to make a difference on a global scale. We believe in the power of Random Acts of Kindness and want to improve the world in any way we can.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: the dreams of those who sleep upon feathers are not more beautiful than the dreams of those who sleep upon the earth.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the most dynamic and fastest growing place the world has ever seen, I try every day to keep up with advances and stay afloat whilst making the place faster and more exciting to those who come see it. My world is the internet, my toolbox is LAMP and my job is to help make my world more amazing. BTW, I believe communication is key to toppling corruption...Kiva is a part of this.

lender.name: melanie
lender.loan_because: if we all help each other we create a more positive environment for our children
lender.occupational_info: i am a mom and wife trying to raise consciencious healthy kids

lender.name: Yohanes
lender.loan_because: I need money to grew my business. I need to buy some printing machinery.
lender.occupational_info: I work as project and IT manager in an event organizer field. But i really want to open my own business.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: This is my first time loaning. I like the idea of helping others become self sufficient and to see their hard work pay off.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I teach students in the 3rd and 4th grade (ages 8-10 yrs. old).

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: If you give someone a fish you feed them for a meal. Teach them to fish and feed them for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: As and entrepreneur and c.f.o. for my sons struggling construction business I know how scarry it can get. If we don't make it I hope someone out there does.

lender.name: angie
lender.loan_because: I believe in this organization and in helping the many who struggle to better their lives, support their family and their community.
lender.occupational_info: Graphic designer, textile designer, jewelry designer, web designer,

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe building a business case around a social issue guarantees a solution will be found. I believe free market capatalism is the best road to ending poverty. I believe in people.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the production, marketing and product development for a line of industrial valves...

lender.name: Hanno
lender.loan_because: I think people need to help each other out, and that it can be used to show God's love for every person on this planet.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the development of insurance administration system as a software engineer.

lender.name: Terri Nakamura
lender.loan_because: 33 years ago a bank made a loan to my small business. Since then I've done well so it's great to be able to help someone else now.
lender.occupational_info: I create corporate identities and develop branding and design annual reports, brochures, web sites, magazines, product packaging and just about anything that visually communicates.

lender.name: Online-Marketing-Agentur
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: http://www.spurtig.de http://www.hsdpa-flatrate.de http://www.funkster.de http://www.mobil-telefonieren.de http://www.rslcom.de

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help in some small way.

lender.name: Phoenix Institute
lender.loan_because: gives people opportunities
lender.occupational_info: I am a Director of a tertiary college that teaches students to become counsellors and art therapist in Australia

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to help others not as fortunate as us Canadians. Those who have the same work ethic, passion for life, and want to make something of themselves and their communities, they truly deserve my help.
lender.occupational_info:
Inmates in Canada get 3 square meals a day, endless TV and movies, a clean warm bed to sleep in...yet they still complain relentlessly about being so hard done by! They will never know the true hardship or struggle like those who live in a 3rd world country.
Every time I donate, I feel I am correcting some bad karma.

lender.name: Anastasia
lender.loan_because: Being a Russian whose youth happened to be in the time of the collapse of the Soviet Union and of the resulting virtual demolition of the Russian economy, with people having no jobs, no money, no food and nowhere to turn to; having grown up through a lot of hardship - I was fortunate enough to get out of this unhappiness and poverty. I want to help talented people around the world not to miss their chance in life. I always planned to start donating "somewhere in future" but justified not doing so with not making enough money yet. Kiva is a great tool to make something real right here right now, to trust through the traceability of each loan, to feel involved through progress reports, to be a part of the global team of people doing the same good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Shell on international assignments, now in Norway. My idea is that driving economic progress is the foundation for the individual life improvement - poor people sruggle through life for food and basic needs but this is not and should not be the purpose of life. Multinational oil companies, no matter how rich they are blamed to be, stimulate economic growth in the countries they develop projects in- through brining technology, resources, market experience, money - the rest is up to the local goverments tfor channelling all those resources into the local development.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I was given a certificate to loan for my birthday.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help people out who are less fortunate than myself. I was blessed to be born into a rich nation. While I did not grow up with a lot of money or status myself, I am now at a point where I am comfortable. I want to make that dream a reality for other people as well.
lender.occupational_info: I schedule resources, manage budgets, and track activities towards completion for small scale and large scale HR projects!

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I believe that all people should have an opportunity to lead a happy and fulfilled life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach classes about critical thinking, society, and technology at a small college.

lender.name: RAMARAO
lender.loan_because: I want to join in the net programmes to earn more money.
lender.occupational_info: Money making through online marketing

lender.name: Bryan
lender.occupational_info: I run a 20-plex Cinema in the San Jose, California area.

lender.name: Corene
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work in a student ran organization on our high school campus. I teach students how to fundraise, and plan events. I love my job!

lender.name: sai
lender.loan_because: I had Huge loss in my business. I have to pay to the Financier.

lender.name: Lucas
lender.occupational_info: I script programs for Johnson & Johnson, so they can have the so called "Silent Installation". With that, users don't have to keep clicking 'next' to install programs and there won't be any signal in the computer that the program was installed, after the uninstall

lender.name: elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I tell people how they can improve what they're writing.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: "We all do better when we all are doing better". This is a great opportunity to help out.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and engineers. It's geeky fun and interesting.

lender.name: DrewPaik
lender.loan_because: I'd waste the money on something stupid otherwise.

lender.name: Timo
lender.loan_because: I like being able to be able to see directly where my money is going, and to know that that money is being used in a way that directly helps others.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because:
Because I am a follower of Jesus Christ. Everything I am and have is a gift. I am just a steward or a manager of some stuff God has entrusted to me to use for his Glory.
"Beware lest you say in your heart, 'My power and the might of my hand have gotten me this wealth.' You shall remember the LORD your God, for it is he who gives you power to get wealth" Deuteronomy 8:17-18

lender.name: Dario
lender.loan_because: i am finally at the point where i can!

lender.name: Earl
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who have less and are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I do woodworking. I make wooden bowls and boxes. I give them to friends and family.

lender.name: Chubb
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than myself.

lender.name: David & Judith
lender.loan_because: We are blessed with a good family income and believe in helping others to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We assist transportation (trucking) fleets software

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: everyone needs help. In underdeveloped countries, making peanut butter, trying to feed their families on penny a day, they need our help. Love makes the world go round.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I, too, am an entrepreneur and want to help out fellow entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write professional resumes and help people to find their passion in a career.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to give a hand to people who work for what they want

lender.name: stephen
lender.loan_because: because this is a great way of helping people to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I advise charities and not for profit organisations about how the law affects them

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: It's something that can change peoples lives so dramatically, and it feels good to help!
lender.occupational_info: I assist Veterinarians in all aspects of the hospital. Vaccinations, surgery, lab work, etc.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I believe that God wants us to share with others
lender.occupational_info: I work for a lawyer who handles the purchase / sale of real estate

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I love to see people succeed!

lender.name: Rosemary & Tommy
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows us to touch the lives of people who are willing to work to improve their lives.

lender.name: Barbara H
lender.loan_because: I've been helped a lot in my life, I'd like to help someone else.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: someone once took a chance on me and now its time for me to pass that kindness on to others. "Pay it forward" is a great statement.

lender.name: RPCVs SierraLeone
lender.loan_because: we want to remain connected to a place that is meaningful to us; and because we understand the power of this community of borrowers & lenders.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of 79 returned Peace Corps Volunteers who served in Sierra Leone in the late 1960s. The core of our group is made up by the legendary 1967 Chiefdom Development Program

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Its an amazing way to help people so far away.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a medical clinic helping people recover from injury and sickness. I also am part of a team of people who create websites.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: our school got involved through a character education assembly. If a sixth grade class can work to make 4 loans, I certainly can lend on my own too.

lender.name: Brian, Maija & Vincenzo
lender.loan_because: we believe two things will make the world a better place, better education for girls and boys and the economic empowerment of women.
lender.occupational_info: Brian -- grape farmer Maija -- student/mother Vincenzo -- son

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I really want to help others in other countries and a friend told me about this site. I love helping others.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to have the ability to help and believe it is important to make a positive impact in other peoples lives. Little actions can make a world of difference!

lender.name: Synovate Ltd. (Canada)
lender.occupational_info: Synovate, the market research arm of Aegis Group plc, generates consumer insights that drive competitive marketing solutions. The network provides clients with cohesive global support and a comprehensive suite of research solutions. Synovate employs over 6,400 staff across 62 countries.

lender.name: Rob W.
lender.loan_because: it's good to be useful.
lender.occupational_info: I'm also an entrepreneur -- I work almost completely online, designing and developing websites and software. This has enabled me to explore and live in many parts of the world.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and because my birth/life has been very fortunate so I feel it is my duty to give to those whose birth/life is much less fortunate than my situation. Who knows I may be an entrepreneur needing assistance in the next life...
lender.occupational_info: I am in business to business print and direct mail sales.

lender.name: Ian, Jo, Lily, Stanley
lender.loan_because: The gap between the rich and the poor in this world is a scandal. The route out of poverty is often just a tiny amount of capital
lender.occupational_info: We write and act and doctor

lender.name: Leti, Karen, Aly & Katie
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a non-proft medical clinic that provides services at a reduced rate to people who may not otherwise have access to health care

lender.name: Fransje
lender.loan_because: it is a very good project
lender.occupational_info: i am a housemaker

lender.name: Mark & Maude
lender.loan_because: We don't have the resources of Gates and Buffet, but its nice to contribute a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: We do medical research.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It's the donation that never stops giving.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm senior in college studying International Business, Marketing, Global Supply Chain and Operations Management, and French. I hope to someday work for a company that is directly investing in Africa.
The website is my mom's. She sells books.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Empowering others to help themselves preserves one's dignity while helping to build a smaller, more unified World.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a federal agency's real estate portfolio.

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupational_info: I train lifeguards, teach CPR to nursing, phlebotomy and medical office assistant students and teach people who are afraid of the water how to swim. In essence, when I teach the people who are afraid, some of whom have difficulty getting in the pool the first day, I am playing in the water.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have a small manufacturing unit & get the manufacturing orders too, but I cannot fund the current expenses on manufacturing.
lender.occupational_info: This is manufactured in Pakistan an exported to USA and UK

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: My stepfather is loaning this money as his birthday gift, he wanted to give to others to help make a better world. HAPPY BIRTHDAY BARRY !
lender.occupational_info: unique.

lender.name: Anne Marie
lender.occupational_info: I am a finance student at the University of Florida.

lender.name: theprisoner6
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: I write practice test questions

lender.name: Candace
lender.loan_because: as my momma used to say, "Money's no good unless you spend it."

lender.name: Prakash
lender.loan_because: it is a small step towards making the world a better place - by making a difference to someone by providing them an economic opportunity they wouldn't have had otherwise.
lender.occupational_info: I create magic with my hands ;-)

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I help children learn to read.

lender.name: alejaaandro
lender.loan_because: hopefully i' ll help somebody that wasn't lucky enough to be born in a "developed" county....

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: "Give to him who asks of you, and do not turn away from him who wants to borrow from you" -Jesus

lender.name: Sandra M
lender.loan_because: Every time people like these succeed, they lift the well-being of their local community, and a lot of people can live with dignity. www.ajaxstamp.com my lost dogs.

lender.name: Helen

lender.occupational_info: I help parents of young children: 1) Understand the ways children are different from the day they are born. 2) Live more in harmony with each individual child 3) Learn ways to bring out the best in each child.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I enjoy following the stories of the people I loan too, I think Kiva is a great program.
lender.occupational_info: Human Resources support to a manufacturing company of 3,500.

lender.name: Isaac & Rebecca
lender.loan_because: Our family gives where we live. But, as long as I've known about microcredit I've wanted to get involved. This gives me a way to feel connected to people working to improve their standard of living in places where I've worked and visited.
lender.occupational_info: I help mothers give birth and breastfeed their babies and children. My husband does computer stuff. My son is 11 and my daughter is 7.

lender.loan_because: I care and because I can!

lender.name: John & Christy
lender.loan_because: The idea that we can help someone from around the world that WANTS to work and provide themself a better life is uplifting!

lender.name: Garret
lender.loan_because: I don't want to be the kind of person who disregards the suffering of other people. I want to be the kind of person that helps other people improve their own lives.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I can. Why not help out?

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help.
lender.occupational_info: relaxed, focused, and joyful.

lender.name: Thompson
lender.loan_because: these people need it!!

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work on an airplane called the Global Hawk. It is a very complex airplane that flies without a pilot. It flies very high (60,000 ft) and takes pictures with special cameras that can see at night and can detect heat. The US government uses it in Iraq. There are no weapons onboard. In the 2007 wildfires in southern California it was used to take pictures of the fires (the cameras can see through smoke). These pictures were used to help the firefighters track the progress of the fires and help people who needed to be evacuated.

lender.name: DocPascal
lender.loan_because: I think that little drops can make a big river. so lend few dollars will help lot of people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a general practitioner in a small city in Burgundy in France

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Every loan makes a difference.

lender.name: Sunnie
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has the potential ability to make a difference and to fulfill his dreams to some extent. Supporting the evolution of someone's potential ability to practical skill for which monetary means is necessary makes me happy.

lender.name: louis hemmings & family
lender.loan_because: i want to share some of my spare money. as John Wesley, the 18th C preacher & Methodist said: "earn as much as you can, save as much as you can, give as much as you can."
lender.occupational_info: i buy used books in ireland that are unwanted & unloved & sell them on to book lovers & students worldwide for extra, via the internet & ALIBRIS.

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: l love to see dreams come true

lender.name: David G
lender.loan_because: when I was younger I worked in the Middle East, South America and elsewhere and now that I am back home in Canada I wish to offer something sustainable back to the people of those countries I lived in.

lender.name: eric and mai
lender.loan_because: people gave me money to. well, i asked them to...
lender.occupational_info: i work at a high school in japan teaching english.

lender.name: The Merrys

lender.occupational_info: A Devoted father & Husband to my two girls :-)

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with so many wonderful things in my life. I believe we are our brothers keeper and must share God's goodness whenever possible.

lender.name: Sydney
lender.occupational_info:
Birthday; February 15, 2:15 am, 2008
Turn Ons: Dry diaper, Fast Feeding, Steady rhythmic motion. Turn Offs: Wet diaper, diaper changing, cold rooms and being dropped on the floor.
Perfect Date: Breast feeding during sunset in my favorite glider with Hearts of Space gently playing in the background.
Ambitions: To go an entire night without waking up my parents.

lender.name: rabiou amadou
lender.loan_because: Growing up in a third world country, I know how what I will consider today a few dollars, can make a difference or change a family's life. I hope my loans will help someone out there fight poverty.

lender.name: Augustus
lender.loan_because: I want to help the educational aspirations of those around the world.

lender.name: Kerry

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: there are people that need my money more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to one day change the world for the glory of God. I want to make a difference in His name. Right now, I need to work hard to learn and hone my abilities to accomplish this.

lender.name: Melissa

lender.occupational_info: I take raw clay and then I put it on a wheel that spins around and from there I can form shapes like bowls, cups, plates, etc..

lender.name: Adrien
lender.loan_because: I believe that anyone can change the world. There is only one rule to succeed: start today :)

lender.name: Brenda / Wanda
lender.loan_because: Brenda, on the left in the photo, was a brave courageous woman. She died peacefully with colon cancer 2/8/08. Instead of sending flowers, I requested donations to be sent to social justice organizations in her honor. A Kiva gift certificate was sent to me by longtime friends, Cheryl, Ann, & Shenan.
lender.occupational_info: Social justice educator!

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I work on political issues.

lender.name: AMIRALI
lender.loan_because: Since I have been in the same situation previously, I fully understand desires and hopes of these individuals to fulfill their aspirations and ambitions to grow in this world like any body else and be proud of it..
lender.occupational_info: My work starts early in the morning and ends late in the evenings six days a week. Recently on Sundays i have been taking it easy so that i can run my personal errands.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I don't want the world to change me.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a library technician in a prison for youthful offenders.

lender.name: Nuri
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a revolutionary idea that works. Helping others has never been this easy. I also loan because by doing so I give someone less fortunate a chance of a better life.

we can.

lender.occupational_info: I am a retired engineer of Chinese ancestry. My father struggled in US, which did not help him, only gave him the opportunity to succeed or fail. He both failed and succeeded and I am the result, a very cautious but hopeful woman of 82 this year.

lender.loan_because: I believe that we must help those who want to better themselves
lender.occupational_info: rewarding

lender.occupational_info: Currently an office manager, soon to retire. I'll have even more time to spend in the Kiva website!

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: a little can go a long way

lender.loan_because: If I can give and have the opportunity to help someone help themselves there is no reason not to give.

lender.name: sherri
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to help others
lender.occupational_info: I look for ways to promote and publicize the companies I work for...I use media of all types, and write marketing materials such as brochures, newsletters, flyers, advertisements

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: what better way to help those that want to change their world?

lender.name: Henk
lender.loan_because: Give your money away in case of acute crises, loan it when you want to be a partner in solving poverty
lender.occupational_info: I am a human resource manager in an institution for mentally retarded clients. Our clients directly benefit from professional staff. That's my drive.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: You have give more than you take.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student Naval Flight Officer. I am training to work the systems in a military aircraft.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should help those in need. No matter how poor you are there is something you can do. Even a friendy word could change a persons day, month, year or even their outlook on life. SO... Smile and pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an analytical laboratory analyzing pharmaceuticals.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I love to see people around the world grow their own businesses and improve the lives of their families, themselves, and their customers.
lender.occupational_info: I work on technologies for computers and wireless communications devices.
